info.name: Ironcliw AI Agent API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Ironcliw AI Agent - A sophisticated multi-modal AI system with voice biometrics, vision intelligence, and autonomous capabilities.

## Base URL
`http://localhost:8010`

## Features
- Voice Biometric Authentication
- Screen Control & Unlock
- Vision Intelligence
- Wake Word Detection
- Display Monitoring
- Memory Management
- Self-Healing System
- Hybrid Cloud Integration

## API Documentation
Swagger UI: http://localhost:8010/docs

item.name: Health & Status
item.description: System health checks and component status endpoints

request.description: Quick health check with component status
Root endpoint - returns basic API info
Get status of all Ironcliw components
Get performance metrics for all components

item.name: Startup
item.description: System startup and initialization endpoints

request.description: HTTP endpoint for polling-based progress updates
Play Ironcliw startup announcement using macOS Daniel voice
Test endpoint to verify voice is working

item.name: Screen Control
item.description: Screen lock/unlock and display management

request.description: Unlock the screen using advanced transport layer. Methods: keychain, password, voice
Get current screen lock status and transport health
Reset transport health metrics and circuit breakers

item.name: Ironcliw Voice
item.description: Ironcliw voice system - activation, commands, TTS, and CoreML

request.description: Make Ironcliw speak the given text
Transcribe audio using Hybrid STT Router with RAM-aware model selection
Get Hybrid STT Router performance statistics
Async voice detection using CoreML with circuit breaker protection
Voice Activity Detection only (faster, no speaker recognition)
Train speaker recognition model with new audio samples
Get CoreML voice engine performance metrics
Check CoreML engine availability and status

item.name: Enhanced Voice
item.description: Enhanced voice processing with Rust acceleration

request.description: Activate Ironcliw voice system with Rust acceleration
Get Ironcliw system status with performance metrics
Process voice input with Rust acceleration
Demo endpoint to show Rust acceleration benefits

item.name: Audio & TTS
item.description: Text-to-speech and audio processing

request.description: Forward audio speak requests to Ironcliw voice API
GET endpoint for audio speak (frontend fallback)

item.name: Wake Word
item.description: Wake word detection (Hey Ironcliw)

request.description: Report a false positive wake word detection

item.name: Memory Management
item.description: M1/M2 optimized memory management

request.description: List all registered components with their current status
Register a new component for memory management
Check if a component can be loaded
Get detailed status of a specific component
Intelligently optimize memory for LangChain operations

item.name: Models
item.description: ML model management and selection

request.description: Get details of a specific model
Get models that have a specific capability
Select optimal model for a task
Get model recommendations for an intent
Execute task with automatic model selection
Get RAM status for model lifecycle

item.name: Voice Unlock (Biometric Auth)
item.description: BEAST MODE voice biometric authentication system with ECAPA-TDNN embeddings

request.description: Get voice unlock system status including enrolled users and system health
Start a new voice enrollment session for a user

formdata.description: Audio file for voice authentication (WAV format)
Optional: Specific user to authenticate against

request.description: Authenticate a user via voice biometrics
List all users enrolled in voice unlock system

item.name: Voice Authentication Intelligence
item.description: Advanced voice authentication with LangGraph reasoning, Langfuse audit trails, ChromaDB patterns, and multi-factor fusion. Test endpoints for the intelligent authentication pipeline.

request.description: Get comprehensive status of all voice authentication intelligence components including LangGraph, Langfuse, ChromaDB, and cache.
Quick health check for the voice auth intelligence API.
Test initialization of all components (speaker_service, audit_trail, pattern_store, voice_cache, feedback_generator, multi_factor_engine).
Perform enhanced voice authentication with LangGraph adaptive reasoning, multi-factor fusion, Langfuse audit trail, and ChromaDB anti-spoofing.
Simulate a successful authentication with high confidence match.
Simulate detected replay attack - tests anti-spoofing.
Simulate authentication in noisy environment with low SNR.
Start a new Langfuse audit session for tracking authentication attempts.
End an audit session with final outcome (authenticated, denied, timeout, cancelled).
Get recent authentication traces from the Langfuse audit trail.
Get detailed information about a specific authentication trace.
Check if audio has been used before (anti-spoofing replay attack detection).
Store a voice pattern in ChromaDB for behavioral analysis (rhythm, phrase, environment, emotion, audio_fingerprint).
Search for similar voice patterns in ChromaDB by embedding vector.
Get voice processing cache statistics (Helicone-style cost optimization) including hit rate, miss rate, and savings.
Get current multi-factor authentication weights and thresholds.
Calculate fused confidence from individual factors (voice, behavioral, context, proximity, history) and get authentication decision.
Generate voice feedback message based on authentication result and context.
Generate security alert feedback for detected threats (replay_attack, voice_cloning, synthetic_voice, unknown_speaker, environmental_anomaly).

item.name: 8. Score Calibration (PRD v2.0)
item.description: Platt Scaling and Isotonic Regression for probability calibration. Enables meaningful 90%/95%/98% thresholds.

request.description: Full calibrated authentication pipeline. Combines fine-tuning evaluation + score calibration + adaptive thresholds.
Add a calibration training sample. Need 30+ samples for Platt scaling, 100+ for Isotonic regression.
Force-fit the calibration model with current samples. Uses Platt (30-99 samples) or Isotonic (100+ samples).
Get system status including calibration readiness, training progress, and threshold adaptation.
Get current vs target thresholds. Targets: base=0.90, high=0.95, critical=0.98.
Calibrate a raw cosine similarity score to a meaningful probability.
Visual progress report showing current vs target thresholds with progress bars.

item.name: 9. Fine-Tuning (PRD v2.0)
item.description: AAM-Softmax + Center Loss + Triplet Loss for speaker embedding improvement.

request.description: Perform a manual training step with batch embeddings and labels.
Evaluate an embedding against the fine-tuned model (center distances, AAM logits).
Get training progress including total steps, loss trends, and center distances.
Persist the current fine-tuning state to disk.

item.name: 10. Anti-Spoofing (PRD v2.0)
item.description: Comprehensive anti-spoofing detection: replay, synthesis, voice conversion, environmental.

request.description: Run all anti-spoofing checks: replay, synthesis/deepfake, voice conversion, environmental anomaly.
Detect synthetic/deepfake audio. Checks pitch variation, jitter, shimmer, HNR, breathing patterns.
Detect voice conversion/morphing attacks by analyzing embedding stability across a session.
Analyze environmental signature to detect anomalies (unusual reverb, noise floor changes).
Test anti-spoofing with simulated scenarios: legitimate, replay_attack, synthesis_attack, voice_conversion.
Test the full authentication pipeline with all components: Langfuse audit, voice analysis, ChromaDB patterns, multi-factor fusion, and feedback generation.
Test the full authentication pipeline simulating a failure scenario.

item.name: Context Intelligence
item.description: Context awareness, OCR processing, and intelligent context queries

request.description: Query context information - ask about current activity, history, patterns
Get high-level overview of current context
Update context with OCR data from screen capture
Record a context event (commands, app switches, etc.)
Get learned user patterns (commands, apps, active hours)

item.name: Monitoring (System)
item.description: System monitoring, metrics collection, and performance tracking

request.description: Get comprehensive system metrics (CPU, memory, disk, process)
Get detailed resource usage (memory maps, files, network)
Get health status of all Ironcliw components
